title: Psychoactivist - We're Lovin' It
description:
Independently produced & recorded in Toronto's Kensington Market, where the band resided & rehearsed. Punk rock, Hardcore (with some influences from Thrash & Metal),
Lyrics are oriented around Political & Sociological Issues.

Recorded in 2005

PsychoActivist is (was):
Lead Vocals: Citizen Greg Harrington
Drums: (The) James Stuart
Guitar(s): Ken Pallbearer
Bass & Backup Vocals: Eli Fish
Guest Vocals on "Praying For War":Dave Grim

*Previous members, & writers of the original versions of the songs include:
Jake Fish, Cody ___, Shawn Primmer

**Citizen Greg is the main proprietor of this album, and has given permission to FREELY spread this music across the world.

DOWNLOAD THIS ALBUM, BURN CDs AND GIVE IT TO YOUR FRIENDS & FAMILY, WITH NO CONSEQUENCES OF ANY LEGAL REPERCUSSIONS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
